channel.title: My fist script inawhile
channel.description: okay soo say you want to be the first person to leave someone a comment to say happy birthday on there birthday but dont feel like staying up. well i made this to do just that because i didnt feel like staying up to do it. haha it uses bitmaps, only one set of co-ords because i couldnt use a bitmap to click the comment box because it was white soo yea here it is.

item.title: My fist script inawhile
item.dc:creator: @Bebemycat2 Bebe
item.description:
@Bebemycat2 wrote:

[ul][li]Use sandards[/li]
[li]A classic squig script <3 :D[/li]
[li]Smaller bitmaps[/li]
[li]Bitmaps should rarly be over 15 x 15 at most![/li][/ul]

Read full topic
